resources.string: The latest information for your next course sessions is available.
You\'ve finished for today! Your sessions continue
You\'ve finished all of your course sessions for this year!
Student Now does not currently provide exam seating information. You should check the University Portal and make a note of this yourself.
Sorry! There was an error processing your latest timetable information. This is probably our fault and your timetable should return when the issue is resolved.
Tap to see your sessions for the rest of the week.

Can\'t find the programme you\'re looking for? Tap here for more information
Student Now is a timetable assistant for university students. You will receive helpful notifications keeping you informed what sessions you have and where.
Swipe these cards to move onto the next stage of the setup
We need to know what university you go to in order to retrieve your timetable
Select your programme from our listing
You will find multiple listings for your course, you should select the one which corresponds to your current year of study.\nYou will be notified to reselect your programme when finished.
Student Now has been unable to connect to the cloud and so is unable to display your latest information
Student Now is currently experiencing difficulty refreshing your latest information. Normal service should resume shortly. We apologise for any inconvinience caused.
We need to know which university you go to in order to retrieve the correct information.
